title: Apple Shop Leader - Ankara (based in a retail partner store)
summary: Imagine, what you could do here? At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it...
description: We connect customers to Apple's solutions, and ensure delivery of outstanding Apple customer experiences within your store through close engagement and partnership across all levels of the Reseller store team. Educate and encourage Reseller store teams to stay knowledgeable on the latest Apple product and services portfolio. Run and grow the business in your store to achieve targets...
key_qualifications: You are passionate, approachable and know how to connect with customers to deliver outstanding customer experience. You understand that to be effective, you discuss customers needs and values and how they intend to use Apple's products and services. You align all of this information and recognise that each customer is different...
education_experience: University degree essential. Excellent English language skills preferred.
additional_requirements: Apple is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity.
